觠字的基本解释

觠
quán
（兽角）卷曲：“犊在道死，唯觠角存。”
弯曲；蜷曲。

觠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quán］
［《廣韻》巨員切，平仙，羣。］
［《廣韻》居倦切，去線，見。］
牛羊角卷曲貌。

觠字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【角字部】　觠； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1141第15
【唐韻】巨員切【集韻】逵員切，?音權。【說文】曲角也。【爾雅·釋畜】羊角三觠，羷。【疏】觠，捲也。【北史·司馬子如傳】相王給露車一乗，觠㹀牛犢，犢在道死，唯觠角存。　又【集韻】古轉切，音卷。又【廣韻】居倦切【集韻】古倦切，?卷去聲。義?同。　【六書正譌】俗作?，非。

觠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
觠字的起名意思

暂无。

觠
Basic explanation of words
觠
quán
(Beast horns) Curl: "The calf dies in the Tao, but only the horns remain."
Bend; curl up.
觠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［quán］
["Guangyun" giant cut, flat fairy, group. ]
["Guangyun" is tired and cut, go to the line, see you. ]
Curly appearance of cow horns.
觠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Jiao Zi Department] 　觠; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1141, 15
[Tang Yun] Giant members cut [Ji Yun] Kui members cut, right? [Said the text] The angle is also curved. 【Erya·Shi Hu】Three sheep horns, Yi. 【Sparse】觠, volume also. [Northern History·Sima Ziru Biography] The king gave a ride to the car, and the calf died in the road, but the horns remained.　[Ji Yun] Ancient Zhuan cut, sound volume. [Guang Yun] Ju Tired Cut [Ji Yun] Ancient Tired Cut, Rolling away. Righteous? Same.　【Six Books Zhengzheng】Vulgar writing? No.
觠

Name meaning
Nothing.
quán, guán
сущ. * кривые рога
